phrases: If you are not paying attention, be prepared for a poking attack from my fingers
I am little, but I will squish you; you are as tiny as a flea to me
What I want is a plastic heart (plus, plus, but it is a minus)
But that is boring; when I would notice it, I would have won against you
Love is something that is bittersweet
Simple and clear yet complex and strange stuff
I am only worrying about things that do not matter
You are gentle and sincere yet eccentric
I pretend to be strong all over and compete against you
Just by being honest, it is so stimulating and I feel dizzy
I get hurt, I hurt you, in a preparation of pure feelings
In my head, there is always a pre-parade of pure feelings all by myself
Then let us put salt on
Because I want you to know more about me
More than anyone else, I want to bare my self
But I cannot do it, I have got nothing for experience
But a love that is just sweet
Is slightly different from what I am seeking
If I am told it is white
I would say it is black
I say one thing but do another
If I am told, I love you
I would say, I hate you
I am happy, but what am I saying?
You stayed up late again, did not you?
I confirmed this up to 2:30 AM.
If it is about breakfast, I brought it already.
I will warm it up for you, so go and wash your face.
All right, and now for the dishes and laundry...
Just what are you looking at?
You have a problem with that?
Even if you have a problem, there is no way in hell I am going to listen to it.
This... is supposed to be Kitamura?
When I try to take pictures of Kitamura-kun, I...
I will not say I am good at it, but anything is better tha -
H-How many are you willing to take?
What kind of picture shall I get?
In the middle of softball practice?
Oh, cannot forget to take one of him eating lunch!
Like I said, I will take as many as you want.
As many as you want, but there is a limit, is not there?!
Okay, then take an infinite amount.
Yeah, it is because I went to student council first.
I will go on ahead, then.
How was I supposed to get that?
Maruo, look at this for a second.
Hey, hey, look at this magazine model!
It is almost time for the morning assembly, you two.
Stop the blabbering and get moving to the school yard.
Aw, he will not play along.
He is too serious because he is the vice-president.
I wanted some sort of reaction, at least.
Somehow, Kitamura seems to be really popular with the girls.
Want me to roll you up, huh?!
Lately, a bunch of you morons have been forgetting your student handbooks!
According to the Disciplinary Officer's report,
during last week's inspection of personal belongings, there were...
Uh, how many was it again?
School-wide, a total of fifty-six people had forgott -
Anyway, coming to school without your student handbook is like forgetting your pride as students at Oohashi!
You are forgetting something as well.
You little runt, did you say something?
You are forgetting to put everyone at ease.
Geez, even though we are high schoolers we still have to line up like idiots and waste our time listening to this worthless crap.
You were just holding your hands on your hips.
Great, trying to work up a sweat early this morning?
No back pain, no pain from being in labour,
and yet we are holding onto our hips!
I am sorry, President, please continue the morning assembly.
Was the Palmtop Tiger biting at the president?
Okay, okay, that is enough Haruta-kun.
Are not you in a good mood today?
Let us have you happily read for us!
I was being a nuisance to Kitamura by arguing with the student council president...
But I want to apologise too!
The student council president does not care about minor things like that.
Allow me to impose on you, too!
Doing this once in a while is really nice.
What will today's side dishes be?!
H-How did things end up like this?
And a one, and a two... chicken in!
Whoa, Taiga's got a mountain of side dishes.
Oh shit, our lunch boxes are identical!
Aisaka, you have been bringing your own lunch box lately.
You know, Kushieda decorates cell phones part-time, right?
I figured I would get some pocket money by making lunch boxes.
I would like to try one of Takasu's lunch boxes one day.
The lunch is probably going to be brownish and cool!
O-Okay, I will make some for everyone next time.
Oh, it is the softball club's manager.
Go on and eat without us.
That was too close for comfort.
Eating with Kitamura-kun, talking with Kitamura-kun -
Listen, was it really okay to just casually let Kitamura know I made your lunch box?
And just when we finally got rumours about us cleared up too...
What are we going to do?!
Geez, why do you get so stressed about Kitamura?
Look, you have to be more careful from now on -
If you have got something to say, swallow first.
There is no meat in today's lunch box.
If you prefer having meat in your lunch every day,
then go join a family like that.
As I thought, the mould's roots are deep around public bathrooms!
But my discovery of you heralds your end.
Taka-chan, let us go home already.
Yeah, I will finish up here, so you go ahead.
I will leave it up to you, then.
Hey now, you black little devils!
I will show you guys one of the 48 Takasu-style Housework Skills!
Ryuuji, what are you blabbering about?
Let us go already, you dumb dog.
What the hell are you doing here, this is the men's bath -
Wait, I am setting it you -
Oh geez, just hand it over!
So this is how those foggy pictures got mass produced.
Hey, look how happily he is waving.
Master, one Americano with some Naporitan!
How is this place not getting sued?
And you had to go and print them out, did not you?
Hey, you are overflowing with drool!
There is so much Kitamura-kun, it is a Kitamura carnival...
I know youngsters these days get pissed off easily, but this is too much!
I want to help out, you mongrel.
You took pictures for me, after all.
No, it is okay, I still want to be able to hang out futons tomorrow.
Keep up the nonsense and I will drop you!
You are going to bring lunch boxes next time, right?
Okay, how about you peel the skin off the potatoes?
D-Do not make fun of me!
I just have to peel the skin off these right?
She wants to make home-made food for Kitamura, huh?
It is the same goes for me.
I have finally got a chance to have Kushieda eat the food I make.
I must be more fired up for -
I will not cut my fingers if I do it like this.
And this onigiri is so small and cute!
Well, she can practise as much as she wants with these.
There is no need to peel them after all.
Like I said earlier, eat before you speak.
They have Taiga-chan's scent in them!
Here, I made you some tea.
You better stick them in an album before they get damaged.
Stop nagging like you are my brother-in-law.
What is up with you, here someone is wanting to laminate the ones you really like and stuff.
If you laminate them, they will be okay no matter how many times you fall over or drop them into water.
You know, you can get more than just one?
Just wait, I am picking them out now!
What is up all of the sudden?
I cannot calmly pick the ones I want while I am here so I am going home to do it instead.
I really want a picture, too...
T-This is... a dead light yellow squid?
I made pudding in a bucket!
A haven for a woman's appetite!
But it was really huge after all, so making it did not go so well.
The sticky and soft bits kept splitting from one another and...
You ladies over there, have a look at this!
This is my all-out bucket card play!
And then the sticky and soft bits would not stay together,
and the harmony between them got all ruined!
It is not what I had in mind, but...
I guess I will keep it.
I said I could laminate as many as you want if you could not make up your mind!
If you are going to pester me so much about it, then you pick for me.
I will leave it to you.
As if I could pick for her.
They are pictures of me, are not they?
I left it sitting in here.
You, why do you have this picture?
Back in the day, the photography club was selling photos like these.
Why do you have a picture of Taiga?
I put it there because I was in love with Aisaka.
Well, when I confessed to her, I got rejected in less than a second.
Keep it a secret from everyone, okay?
What a wasteful thing to do...
After that I came to my senses and then I, uh...
The rage that you do not hold back...
I had no idea whether he was praising or criticising me...
But you know, I was happy.
Having someone say you are okay as you are,
and being needed by that person...
It was nice to have someone like that.
Somehow Taiga's lifestyle and her room...
There were so many pictures, and yet there was not one...
I wanted one of that look.
The look he had back when he confessed to me.
Just to see it once more...
W-Why are you making me say embarrassing things, you perverted dog!
Who else is around here, huh?!
I wonder what that means to Taiga.
But man, she sure is a klutz.
If you end up liking him right after,
you should have waited with your answer.
He needs to take responsibility and go out with her if he was already in love.
It would be okay, would not it?
The airhead-type pretty girl, Kawashima Ami, suddenly appears.
For now all I can say is...
